title: geo

xdm:physicalLocationID.title: physical Location Id
xdm:physicalLocationID.description: Surfer browsing location. This isn't exactly the location name - like city or country, instead it is a reference from SE for a geo target.

xdm:interestLocationID.title: interest Location Id
xdm:interestLocationID.description: Location based on interest expressed in search query. For eg. when the search is for string- 'hotel in goa' here the request might be originating from Bangalore but the interest is on Goa.
